recipe

119 Calories (Butter/White Onion/Ground Ginger/Garlic Clove/Tomato Paste/Chicken Thigh/Gram Masala/Paprika/Sugar/Cumin/Turmeric/Salt/Black Pepper/Coconut Cream Data Missing)

0 mg Sodium (Butter/White Onion/Ground Ginger/Garlic Clove/Tomato Paste/Chicken Thigh/Gram Masala/Paprika/Sugar/Cumin/Turmeric/Salt/Black Pepper/Coconut Cream Data Missing)

Recipe

Estimated Time: 25 Minutes

Preheat Instant Pot with Saute on low setting
Dice White Onion
Dice 5 Garlic Cloves
Add 1 tbsp Olive Oil and 1 tbsp Butter into instant pot
Add White Onion and 2 tbsps Ground Ginger and all the Garlic Clove
Async 4 minutes Saute in instant pot
     |- Cut 2 pounds Chicken Thigh into 1 inch cubes
     |- Wash knife
     |- Wash cutting boards
Add 6 ounces Tomato Paste
Timer 3 minutes Constantly stir
Put ½ cup Water in instant pot
Put Chicken Thigh in instant pot
Add spice 1 tbsp Gram Masala
Add spice 1 tsp Paprika
Add spice 2 tsps Sugar
Add spice 1 tsp Cumin
Add spice ½ tsp Turmeric
Add spice ½ tsp Salt
Add spice 1 tsp Black Pepper
Timer 5 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 5 minutes, (Preheat takes 0 min)
Async 10 minutes Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve
     |- Put away spices
     |- Wash utensils
Stir in ¾ cup Coconut Cream
Timer 3 minutes Saute on medium
